    • Online indicator.
    • Chat actions.
    • All the chat icons have to be inside html block with ng-controller=”ActionCtrl” attribute.
    • Active cam indicator.
    • Inviting link.
  • INCOME API
  • 1. Request to get information about user.
    • RESPONSE
  • 2. Request to get know is user authorized or not.
    • RESPONSE:
  • 3 Request to get user’s balance.
    • RESPONSE:
  • 4. Request of charging money from user’s account for text chating or video.
    • REQUEST
    • RESPONSE
  • 5. Request to add/remove user to/from the contact list.
    • REQUEST
    • RESPONSE
  • 6. Request to add/remove/get user’s favorites.
    • REQUEST
    • VERSIONS OF THE RESPONSES
  • 7. Request to block/unblock user.
    • REQUEST
    • RESPONSE
  • 8. Request to chek if user blocked or not.
    • RESPONSE
  • 9. Request to send message in message box.
    • REQUEST
    • RESPONSE
  • OUTCOME API
  • 1. Request to add user to the contact list.
    • REQUEST
    • RESPONSE
  • 2. Request to remove user from the contact list.
    • REQUEST
  • 3. Request to update user’s information or create new one if he does not exist.
    • Example:
    • Where:
  • 4. Request to get or change prices.

Django application¶

Authentication views¶

chat.views_api.auth.add_favorite(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Add favorite

[server]/api/[app_name]/[user_id]/[opponent_id]/add_favorite

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/150040/150045/add_favorite

Return: {‘status’: 0, message: ‘ok’}

chat.views_api.auth.del_favorite(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Delete favorite

[server]/api/[app_name]/[user_id]/[opponent_id]/get_favorite

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/150040/150045/del_favorit

Return: {‘status’: 0, message: ‘ok’}

chat.views_api.auth.get_balance(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Get user’s balance

[server]/api/[app_name]/[user_id]/get_balance

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/150040/get_balance

Return: {‘status’: 0, ‘user_id’: 150040, ‘balance’: 35}

chat.views_api.auth.get_favorites(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Get favorite list

[server]/api/[app_name]/[user_id]/get_favorites

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/150040/get_favorites

Return: {‘status’: 0, message: ‘ok’}

chat.views_api.auth.is_auth(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Checking if user authenticated or not.

[server]/api/[app_name]/is_auth

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/is_auth

Return: {‘status’: 0, ‘user_id’: request.session[‘user_id’]}

chat.views_api.auth.login(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Login function. Set couple variables

request.session[‘is_auth’]

request.session[‘user_id’]

[server]/api/[user_id]/[app_name]login

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/150014/tpa1com/login

http://chat.localhost/api/150043/tpa1com/login

http://chat.localhost/api/150031/tpa1com/login

in session to determitate authentication status

chat.views_api.auth.logout(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Logout function.

[server]/api/logout

Delete variables request.session[‘is_auth’] and request.session[‘user_id’] from session Example: http://chat.localhost/api/logout

Contact views¶

chat.views_api.contact.add_contact(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Add new contact to owner

[server]/api/[app_name]/[owner_id]/[contact_id]/add_contact

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/14/15/add_contact

Responce 1: { ‘status’: 0, ‘message’: ‘Contact has been added’ }

Responce 2: { ‘status’: 1, ‘message’: ‘Contact is already exists’ }

chat.views_api.contact.del_all_contacts(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Del all contacts in owner

[server]/api/[app_name]/[owner_id]/del_all_contacts

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/150043/del_all_contacts

Responce 1: { ‘status’: 0, ‘message’: ‘All Contacts have been deleted.’ }

Responce 2: { ‘status’: 1, ‘message’: ‘List Contacts is empty.’ }

chat.views_api.contact.del_contact(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Del contact in owner

[server]/api/[app_name]/[owner_id]/[contact_id]/del_contact

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/14/15/del_contact

Responce 1: { ‘status’: 0, ‘message’: ‘Contact has been deleted’ }

Responce 2: { ‘status’: 1, ‘message’: ‘Contact does not exist.’ }

chat.views_api.contact.get_contact_list(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Function returns user’s contact list

[server]/api/[app_name]/[user_id]/get_contact_list

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/1/get_contact_list

Responce: {“status”: 0, “message”: “ok”, “contact_list”: [{“image”: “/static/images/avatar.jpg”, “is_invisible”: false, “is_invitation_enabled”: true, “culture”: “ru”, “birthday”: “1996-12-08”, “id”: 44, “city”: “Washava”, “user_id”: 3, “name”: “serg”, “country”: “Poland”, “gender”: “m”, “profile_url”: “serg_plofile_url”, “is_camera_active”: false}]}

chat.views_api.contact.get_contact_list_ids(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Function returns user’s ids contact list

[server]/api/[app_name]/[user_id]/get_contact_list_ids

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/1/get_contact_list_ids

Responce: {“status”: 0, “message”: “ok”, “contact_list”: [150023, 150032]}

chat.views_api.contact.mark_watching_profile(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Request to mark indicator about user is watching profile.

[server]/api/[app_name]/[user_id]/[opponent_id]/mark_watching_profile

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/14/15/mark_watching_profile

Responce 1: { ‘status’: 0, ‘message’: ‘ok’ }

chat.views_api.contact.send_invitation(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Function saves invitation from woman.

parameters by POST: app_name,owner_id,contact_id,message

[server]/api/send_invitation

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/send_invitation

Online views¶

chat.views_api.online.get_online(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Function return list of users with opposite gender who are on line

[server]/api/[app_name]/[user_id]/get_online

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/150031/get_online

chat.views_api.online.get_online_except_contact(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Function return list of users with opposite gender who are online except those who is not in contact list.

[server]/api/[app_name]/[user_id]/get_online_except_contact

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/150031/get_online_except_contact

chat.views_api.online.get_online_ids(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Function return list of users (IDs) with opposite gender who are on line

[server]/api/[app_name]/[user_id]/get_online_ids

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/150031/get_online_ids

chat.views_api.online.send_message(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Function make a request to send message to the user’s inbox’.

parameters by POST: app_name,owner_id,contact_id,message

[server]/api/send_message

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/send_message

Room views¶

chat.views_api.room.add_me_to_contact_if_not_exist(tpa, owner, opponent, chanel)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • owner –
  • opponent –
Returns:
chat.views_api.room.check_message(message)[source]¶

Check content of the message on phone number or email or url address

chat.views_api.room.close_chat_room(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Function closes chat session.

[server]/api/[app_name]/[room_id]/close_chat_room

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/34/close_chat_room

chat.views_api.room.get_messages(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Function get message in DB for room and app_name

[server]/api/[room_id]/get_message

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/23/get_message

chat.views_api.room.get_room_or_create(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Function return existed room identifier or create new room. Also it create two records in ChatUser2Room model.

[server]/api/[app_name]/[caler_id]/[opponent_id]/get_online

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/150031/150014/get_online

chat.views_api.room.invite(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Function send invite to opponent.

REMOVED Add the opponent to the contact list.

Mark contact as active

Create the room. Put the user into the room.

chat.views_api.room.mark_new_message(owner, contact)[source]¶

Get contact object and set has_new_message is Tru if this contact is not active.

Parameters:
  • owner –
  • room –
Returns:

contact
chat.views_api.room.multi_invitation(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Function send invite to multiply opponent.

chat.views_api.room.save_message(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Function save message owner in DB,

Check if user is available.

Check message out on stop words and replace them.

Add owner to opponent’s contact list.

If the message is first send notification to tpa side.

parameters by POST: app_name,owner_id,room_id,message

[server]/api/save_message

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/save_message

chat.views_api.room.show_feather(request, *a, **kw)[source]¶

Function sends message to user to show feather indicator to notice about user is started typing.

[server]/api/[app_name]/[room_id]/[opponent_id]/show_feather

Example: http://chat.localhost/api/tpa1com/34/150014/show_feather
